MainItem.Title: temp. Capt.
MainItem.Text: (rel. commn. on ceasing to be empld. as Dental Surgeon and retains rank of Capt.)
, I/t. G. M., M.C. (Adjt., Guards Depot)
, Col. (Hon. Brig.-Gen.) N. A. It., D.S.O. (ceases to belong to Reg. Army Res. of Off., having attained age limit for liability to recall)

MainItem.Text: , V.C., C.M.G., O.V.O., D.S.O. (temp. Col.Comdt. whilst Brig. Oomdr.)

MainItem.Title: Lt.
MainItem.Text: (retires on ret. .pay)

MainItem.Text: , M.C. (Capt., Loyal R., from Rifle Bde.)

MainItem.Text: (2nd Lt., R.A.S.C., from R. Mil. Coll.)

.-Col. C. H. F., D.S.O. (retires on ret. pay)

MainItem.Text: (rel. commn. on completion of service and retains rank of Capt.)

MainItem.Title: Lt.
MainItem.Text: , M.C. (rel. actg. rank of Capt.), Sub. Not

MainItem.Text: , M.C. (seed, whilst empld. as Asst. Instr. at a M.G. Sch.)

MainItem.Title: Qrmr. and Capt.
MainItem.Text: (retires on ret. pay)

MainItem.Text: , M.O., M.R.C.S., L.R.CP. (Lt., on prob., R.A.M.C., late The Queen's R.)
, Capt. (now Lt.-Col.) E. (Maj.) Sub. Not
, 2nd Lt, W. N. (Lt.)

MainItem.Title: temp.
MainItem.Text: O.M., 3rd CI., and Lt. A. (rel. actg. grading of I:O.M., 1st CI., and rank of Maj. on ceasing to be so empld.)

MainItem.Title: Lt.
MainItem.Text: , M.C. (seed, for service with Ind. Ord. Dept.)

MainItem.Title: Maj. and Bt.
MainItem.Text: .-Col. J. E. E., O.B.E. (promn. to rank of Lt.-Col. antedated)

MainItem.Title: Lt.
MainItem.Text: (retl. to estabt.)

MainItem.Title: Capt.
MainItem.Text: (placed on h.p. list on acc. of ill-health on ceasing to be empld. as Instr., R.A.S.C. Trg. College)
> Lt.-Col. J. N., D.S.O. (placed on h.p. list on completion of period of service in comd. Inn. Fus.)
2nd Lt, (late temp. 2nd Lt., Serv. Bns., H.L.I.) R. (rel. rank of 2nd Lt. on enlistment in ranks of R.A.F.)

MainItem.Title: Lt.
MainItem.Text: (seed, whilst Cadre Officer, Sch. of Anti-Aircraft Defence)

MainItem.Title: Capt.
MainItem.Text: , M.C., see Brasier-Creagh, Capt. E. B., M.C. Crichton, Lt.-Col. C. W. H., D.S.O. (placed on h.p. list on vacating appt. as Officer i/c Cav. Records)
, 2nd Lt. J. W. W. (Lt.)
, Capt. (now Maj., Res. of Off.) D. G. C, M.C. (rel. actg. rank of Maj. on ceasing to be spec, empld.)

, Maj. (ret. pay) J. C. (Maj., Reg. Army Res. of Qff., Regtd. List, R.H. and R.F.A.)
